articles.author: Susan Svrluga, Cate Brown
articles.title: Who is Mahmoud Khalil, the Columbia student protester arrested by ICE? - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump wants to deport Khalil, calling him a threat to America for his role in protests against the Israel-Gaza war. Some say, unmasked, he was an easy target.
articles.content:
It was during the height of campus demonstrations last spring that Mahmoud Khalil became the public face of student antiwar protests at Columbia University.
Protesters had erected tents on campuses … [+11835 chars]

articles.title: Goodbye to 'bags fly free' on Southwest, the last airline freebie in America - CNBC

articles.content:

articles.title: Hamas says it will release Edan Alexander, the last living American hostage - The Washington Post
articles.description: The offer to release the American hostage appears to be an effort to pressure Israel into starting discussions over a second phase to the ceasefire in Gaza.
articles.content: Hamas has agreed to release hostage Edan Alexander, an American Israeli dual national and Israeli soldier who is believed to be the last American being held alive in Gaza, along with the bodies of fo… [+5383 chars]

articles.title: U.S. to expel South African ambassador - The Washington Post
articles.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio called South Africa’s U.S. ambassador, Ebrahim Rasool, “a race-baiting politician who hates America” and declared him persona non grata.
articles.content:
